options.content:
**NOTES:** 

1. See [LSVMI Disk Stats And Mount Info Metrics](https://github.com/emypar/linux-stats-victoriametrics-importer/blob/main/docs/proc_diskstats_metrics.md) for metrics description.
1. All panels requires specifc `instance` and `hostname`

targets.expr:
last_over_time(
  proc_diskstats_info{instance="${instance}",hostname="${hostname}"}[${lookback}]
)
* on (instance, hostname, maj_min) group_left(mount_point, source, fs_type)
last_over_time(
  proc_mountinfo{instance="${instance}",hostname="${hostname}"}[${lookback}]
) > 0
or on (instance, hostname, maj_min)
last_over_time(
  proc_diskstats_info{instance="${instance}",hostname="${hostname}"}[${lookback}]
) * (1 - ${mounted_only}) > 0
proc_diskstats_read_pct{instance="${instance}",hostname="${hostname}",name="${disk_name}"}
proc_diskstats_write_pct{instance="${instance}",hostname="${hostname}",name="${disk_name}"}
proc_diskstats_io_pct{instance="${instance}",hostname="${hostname}",name="${disk_name}"}
proc_diskstats_discard_pct{instance="${instance}",hostname="${hostname}",name="${disk_name}"}
proc_diskstats_flush_pct{instance="${instance}",hostname="${hostname}",name="${disk_name}"}
